Posts.Content: Aug 5, 2018 03:35PM Nomoresideffects wrote: I had my first lumpectomy on May 15th with Sentinel node removal 4 nodes removed one had cancer in it they didn't get all the cancer out doing this to me and I still have pain a year-and-a-half later from the node removal I think. I had horrible swelling in my arm pit. Heart racing and it's been over a year since that procedure. Now I've had several surgery s since then. 3 lumpectomy and then a dble mastectomy node removal on my other side. Interesting enough is I have hardly any pain or issues w the other side... At all . I had 2 different surgeons so..I feel like there is a hook in my armpit and have constant pain at incision site. Doing otherwise helps.. do does not having a manual labor job..which I do.. I'm figuring it out. Good day
Posts.Title: Increased pain after lumpectomy Remali Nomoresideffects
